name: VaderSounds
0:
”Alexa, open vader sounds”
”Alexa, start vader sounds”
”Alexa, launch vader sounds”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: vader sounds
des:
This skill contains a huge list of famous Lord Vader quotes.

Below are the list of Lord Vader sounds available for your listening pleasure!

As you wish
Bidding
Breath
Yes my master
Last time
Faith
Destroy
I am your father
I have you now
What happened
Treated unfairly
Power
Proud
Force
He is here
Apology
Offering
Emperor
Obi Wan
Pointless
No Disintegration
Join Us

We will keep adding more sounds regularly...!

Other commands available;

"List Sounds", "Theme Song'', and the most powerful feature is the ''Chat'' feature.

The ''Chat'' feature is where you get to have a conversation with Lord Vader himself.

The conversation goes thus; 

Who are you?
What are you saying?
Seriously
Are you kidding me?
I am not interested
Wrong Person
How can this be?
Enough of this nonsense
Get Out
Am not scared of you

NOTE:
These are the exact words you'll say to get a response from Lord Vader.

DISCLAIMER;
This skill is not in anyway AFFILIATED to or ENDORSED by Disney or Lucasfilm, this is just a fan skill.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
